name: Melee combo demo
description:
Project name: MeleeCombat - a sword melee combat demo
Author: Carlos Fabian Olguin Argueta
Controls:
--> Press MOUSE LEFT CLICK -to attack.
--> Press WASD keys -to move.
--> Press 1 key- to quit.

Details: Playable Chacarter with 4-hit sword combo, scenario spawn enemies to practice, scenario has cell shading post-processing effect.
